price: 36. Kemudian Kami tundukkan kepadanya angin yang berhembus dengan baik menurut perintahnya ke mana saja yang dikehendakinya,
arabic: فَسَخَّرۡنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيۡثُ أَصَابَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fasakharnā lahu al-rīḥa tajrī bi-amrihi rukhāan ḥaythu aṣāba
